fluent-bit.description: Fluent Bit subchart configuration for log collection and forwarding to OpenSearch

config.description: Fluent Bit pipeline configuration (parsers, inputs, filters, outputs)

customParsers.default:
[PARSER]
    Name docker_no_time
    Format json
    Time_Keep Off
    Time_Key time
    Time_Format %Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%L
customParsers.description: Custom parser definitions in Fluent Bit configuration format
customParsers.title: customParsers

filters.default:
[FILTER]
    Name kubernetes
    Buffer_Size 32MB
    K8S-Logging.Parser On
    K8S-Logging.Exclude On
    Keep_Log On
    Match kube.*
    Merge_Log Off
    tls.verify Off
    Use_Kubelet true
filters.description: Filter plugin configuration for log processing
filters.title: filters

inputs.default:
[INPUT]
    Name tail
    Buffer_Chunk_Size 32KB
    Buffer_Max_Size 2MB
    DB /var/lib/fluent-bit/db/tail-container-logs.db
    Exclude_Path /var/log/containers/fluent-bit-*_openchoreo-data-plane_*.log
    Inotify_Watcher false
    Mem_Buf_Limit 256MB
    Path /var/log/containers/*.log
    multiline.parser docker, cri
    Read_from_Head On
    Refresh_Interval 5
    Skip_Long_Lines On
    Tag kube.*
inputs.description: Input plugin configuration for log collection
inputs.title: inputs

outputs.default:
[OUTPUT]
    Name opensearch
    Host opensearch
    Generate_ID On
    HTTP_Passwd ThisIsTheOpenSearchPassword1
    HTTP_User admin
    Logstash_Format On
    Logstash_DateFormat %Y-%m-%d
    Logstash_Prefix container-logs
    Match kube.*
    Port 9200
    Suppress_Type_Name On
    tls On
    tls.verify Off
outputs.description: Output plugin configuration for log forwarding to OpenSearch
outputs.title: outputs
